repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: ILR School Report on the Off-Campus Labor Relations Credit Programs
did.abstract: Report on the Off-Campus Labor Relations Credit Programs/1.5 Credit Hours by the Extension and Non-degree Credit Programs Committee.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the Report on the Off-Campus Labor Relations Credit Programs/1.5 Credit Hours by the Extension and Non-Credit Program Committee from 1982. The committee consisted of John Burton (Chairman), Ronald Donovan, William Frank, Alice Grant, Robert Risley, Anne Nelson, Richard Pivetz, Charles Rehmus (Ex-Officio), and Lois Gray (Ex-Officio).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Report on the Off-Campus Labor Relations Credit Programs #/4053m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
